title: league crashes after champ select HELP!!
body: I've tried everything from messing with internet settings and deleting files.. but nothing seems to work! HELP PLEASE

replies.body:
Crashes after champ select are often caused by specific network settings that prevent your client from establishing a connection to the game server. I strongly recommend working through all the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a next step in troubleshooting this.

Let me know if those steps caused any positive change with this.

I am having the same issue. 4/4 of my games this week have resulted in leaver penalties because my game doesnt load after lobby. and its impossible for me to reconnect. Never had the issue before the patch
